Title: Map Editor: Selection Groups
Contents: The Selection Groups window hosts your stored selection groups, as well as the tools to create, edit and delete them.
Selection Groups are user-defined groupings of map objects which can then be used to quickly re-select the defined group for further use.
Support for up-to 11 keybound selection groups is provided, meaning you can press the key and instantly select all of the map objects assigned to that selection group.
